1: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> מָחֲלַ֗ת <sup>4257 </sup> <n>upon Mahalath</n> מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <sup>4905 </sup> <n>Maschil</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> אָ֘מַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>hath said</n> נָבָ֣ל <sup>5036 </sup> <n>The fool</n> בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in his heart</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>[There is] no God</n> הִֽ֝שְׁחִ֗יתוּ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>Corrupt</n> וְהִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <sup>8581 </sup> <n>are they and have done abominable</n> עָ֝֗וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is no</n> עֹֽשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[there is] none that doeth</n> טֽוֹב׃ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n>
2: אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>from heaven</n> הִשְׁקִ֪יף <sup>8259 </sup> <n>looked down</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> בְּנֵ֫י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>upon the children</n> אָדָ֥ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> לִ֭רְאוֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>to see</n> הֲיֵ֣שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>if there were</n> מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>[any] that did understand</n> דֹּ֝רֵ֗שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>that did seek</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n>
3: כֻּלּ֥וֹ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Every</n> סָג֮ <sup>5472 </sup> <n>Every one of them is gone back</n> יַחְדָּ֪ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>they are altogether</n> נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <sup>444 </sup> <n>become filthy</n> אֵ֤ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> עֹֽשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[there is] none that doeth</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> אֵ֝֗ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is no</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>even</n> אֶחָֽד׃ <sup>259 </sup> <n>no not one</n>
4: הֲלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָדְעוּ֮ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>no knowledge</n> פֹּ֤עֲלֵ֫י <sup>6466 </sup> <n>Have the workers</n> אָ֥וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>of iniquity</n> אֹכְלֵ֣י <sup>398 </sup> <n>? who eat up</n> עַ֭מִּי <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> אָ֣כְלוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>[as] they eat</n> לֶ֑חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>upon God</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> קָרָֽאוּ׃ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>they have not called</n>
5: שָׁ֤ם ׀ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> פָּֽחֲדוּ־ <sup>6342 </sup> <n>fear</n> פַחַד֮ <sup>6343 </sup> <n>There were they in great</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> הָ֪יָה֫ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>had been</n> פָ֥חַד <sup>6343 </sup> <n>[where] no fear</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>was for God</n> פִּ֭זַּר <sup>6340 </sup> <n>hath scattered</n> עַצְמ֣וֹת <sup>6106 </sup> <n>the bones</n> חֹנָ֑ךְ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>of him that encampeth</n> הֱ֝בִשֹׁ֗תָה <sup>954 </sup> <n>[against] thee thou hast put [them] to shame</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>because God</n> מְאָסָֽם׃ <sup>3988 </sup> <n>hath despised</n>
6: מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Oh</n> יִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Oh that</n> מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>[were come] out of Zion</n> יְשֻׁע֪וֹת <sup>3444 </sup> <n>the salvation</n> יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בְּשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>bringeth back</n> אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>When God</n> שְׁב֣וּת <sup>7622 </sup> <n>the captivity</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of his people</n> יָגֵ֥ל <sup>1523 </sup> <n>shall rejoice</n> יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> יִשְׂמַ֥ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>shall be glad</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>[and] Israel</n>
